metadata.description: Production-ready Claude Code plugins for hooks, automation, and workflow enhancement - from the Claude Code Skills Factory

plugins.name: github-cli
plugins.description: GitHub CLI (gh) companion: security guard blocking write operations + comprehensive usage skill for automation, API access, and workflows

plugins.name: modern-cli-enforcer
plugins.description: Enforces modern CLI tools (rg, fd, bat, eza) over legacy commands (grep, find, cat, ls)

plugins.name: native-timeout-enforcer
plugins.description: Enforces use of Claude Code's native timeout parameter instead of external timeout commands

plugins.name: python-manager-enforcer
plugins.description: Enforces package manager usage in Python projects by blocking direct python/python3 commands

plugins.name: codex-advisor
plugins.description: Advisory consultation skill for architectural reviews, design decisions, code analysis, and technology evaluation. Codex provides recommendations without making code changes.

plugins.name: android-analysis
plugins.description: Android APK/AAR/JAR decompilation and inspection toolkit for analyzing compiled binaries and unpacking libraries

plugins.name: ast-grep
plugins.description: Structural code search using AST patterns. Translates natural language queries into ast-grep rules for precise code matching beyond text search.

plugins.name: android-kotlin-compose
plugins.description: Android development guidance with Kotlin and Jetpack Compose. MVVM architecture, state management, Navigation, Room, Hilt, and Material3 patterns.

plugins.name: android-kotlin-coroutines
plugins.description: Android development guidance with Kotlin Coroutines and Flow. Structured concurrency, StateFlow/SharedFlow patterns, lifecycle integration, testing with Turbine, and library integrations.
